title: Bloomberg Markets: Bar Rescue's Taffer Sees 75% Success Rate
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bar Rescue's Taffer Sees 75% Success Rate
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jon Taffer Host and Executive Producer Bar Rescue Discussing his reality show helping save small businesses. He also shares his thoughts on the U.S. economy and the Amazon.com deal to buy Whole Foods Market.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
